artifacts.summary: Analysis of FMP bridge feasibility - concludes FMP cannot bridge finite to full validity

partial_progress.details: Research on FMP bridge approach completed. Conclusion: FMP cannot bridge finite model validity to full validity due to directional asymmetry, temporal polymorphism, and Box semantics mismatch.

research_findings.primary_conclusion: FMP cannot bridge finite model validity to full validity
key_reasons: FMP provides exists-direction transfer, we need forall-direction
Validity quantifies over all temporal types, finite models use fixed bounded type
Box semantics in full models quantifies over ALL histories, finite uses assignment lookup
research_findings.recommendation: Accept semantic_weak_completeness as primary completeness theorem; document architectural limitation
